Html:
Does anyone have a MSBuild task that will take a version number parameter and update all the assemblies in a ModuleCatalog?  We're getting ready for deployment and we're working through some small issues getting features like this organized.

Thanks!

The MSBuild Extension Pack (http://msbuildextensionpack.codeplex.com/) and MSBuildTasks http://msbuildtasks.tigris.org/ both have an AssemblyInfo task that will update version numbers in an AssemblyInfo file, Is that what you're after?
What we ended up doing today was using a custom task that takes in several attributes including a XPath in MSBuild and change the version number in the ModuleCatalog.xaml file.
